title: How do the trolls enter play in hobbit quest 1?

comments.content: I can't seem to figure out how to get the trips our cave into play. what an I missing? [I%20can't%20seem%20to%20figure%20out%20how%20to%20get%20the%20trips%20our%20cave%20into%20play.%20what%20an%20I%20missing?]
The trolls are set aside at the beginning of the quest, but when you reach 2A they are placed in the staging area along with the Troll Cave.
